page.description: Populates the choices in a Dropdownbox control in the Grid or Detail View part.

argument.name: columnName
argument.description: name of the column (must be uppercase)

argument.name: rowNumber
argument.description: row number (1 in the case of Detail View)

argument.name: data
argument.description: a Javascript array of the choices

argument.name: clearExistingData
argument.description: true or false. Existing choices are cleared out if true

section.title: Example
section.description: Populate the choices in the Dropdown Box for the 'COMPANY' field in row 1. Add the new choices to the existing choices.
Populate the choices in the Dropdown Box for the 'COMPANY' field in the Detail View. Replace the existing choices. Each new choice that is added has both a display and stored value.
